metadata.title: CVE-2021-21314 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is open source software which stands for Gestionnaire Libre de ParcInformatique and it is a Free Asset and IT Management Software package. InGLPI before verison 9.5.4, there is an XSS vulnerability involving a loggedin user while updating a ticket.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
